storage

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • storage.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    A container for all of the tables in a database.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTable(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String fields)
      Adds a table to the database with name name and fields described by fields.
      void addTable(Table table)
      Adds the given table to the database
      void delete(java.lang.String tableName, boolean conditional, java.lang.String fieldName, java.lang.String relop, java.lang.String value)
      Deletes all rows of the given table in which the value of the given field meets the condition specified by relop and value or all rows if conditional is false
      void drop(java.lang.String name)
      Removes the field with the given name from the database.
      java.io.File getDataDir()
      Gets the file object for the directory in which files for table data are to be stored
      static Database getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of this class, instantiating it if necessary.
      void insert(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String values)
      Inserts a row described by values into the table named name
      void rename(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String newName)
      Changes the name of a table.

      Returns a string representation of the rows of the specified table in which the given field has a value meeting the condition specified by relop and valueString
      java.lang.String tableString(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a string describing the contents of the specified table
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the names of the tables in the database with charts listing the names and types of the fields
      java.lang.String toXML()
      Returns an XML representation of the database describing its tables

      Sets the given field to the given value in rows of the given table in which the value of the field indicated by condFieldName meets the condition specified by relop and condValueString or all rows if conditional is false

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Database getInstance()
                            throws DatabaseException
        Returns the singleton instance of this class, instantiating it if necessary.
        Returns:
        the lone instance of this class
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if a directory cannot be created to hold data files

      • addTable

        public void addTable(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String fields)
              throws DatabaseException
        Adds a table to the database with name name and fields described by fields.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new table
        fields - the names and types of the fields of the new table
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if fields contains an invalid field description or there is already a table called name

      • addTable

        public void addTable(Table table)
              throws DatabaseException
        Adds the given table to the database
        Parameters:
        table - table to be added
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is already a field by the same name

      • rename

        public void rename(java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String newName)
            throws DatabaseException
        Changes the name of a table.
        Parameters:
        name - original name of the table
        newName - new name for the table
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is no table called name or there is already a table called newName (case insensitive)

      • drop

        public void drop(java.lang.String name)
          throws DatabaseException
        Removes the field with the given name from the database.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the table to be removed
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is no table with the given name in the database

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the names of the tables in the database with charts listing the names and types of the fields
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string describing the tables and their fields

      • toXML

        public java.lang.String toXML()
        Returns an XML representation of the database describing its tables
        Returns:
        an XML representation of the database

      • insert

        public void insert(java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String values)
            throws DatabaseException
        Inserts a row described by values into the table named name
        Parameters:
        values - a string describing a list of values
        name - name of the table into which the values are to be inserted
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is no table named name or values does not match the types of the fields of the table

      • tableString

        public java.lang.String tableString(java.lang.String name)
                             throws DatabaseException
        Returns a string describing the contents of the specified table
        Parameters:
        name - name of the table
        Returns:
        the contents of the named field
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is no table with the specified name

      • getDataDir

        public java.io.File getDataDir()
        Gets the file object for the directory in which files for table data are to be stored
        Returns:
        the data directory

      • select

        public java.lang.String select(java.lang.String tableName,
                      java.lang.String fieldName,
                      java.lang.String relop,
                      java.lang.String value)
                        throws DatabaseException
        Returns a string representation of the rows of the specified table in which the given field has a value meeting the condition specified by relop and valueString
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the table being queried
        fieldName - name of the field to be checked for the condition
        relop - relation operator - "=", "!=", "<", ">", "<=", or ">="
        valueString - value against which the field is to be compared
        Returns:
        a table of rows meeting the condition
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is no table with the given name, the table has no field with the given name, valueString is not a valid datum of the field's type, or there is a problem accessing the table's files

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String tableName,
          java.lang.String fieldName,
          java.lang.String valueString,
          boolean isConditional,
          java.lang.String condFieldName,
          java.lang.String relop,
          java.lang.String condValueString)
            throws DatabaseException
        Sets the given field to the given value in rows of the given table in which the value of the field indicated by condFieldName meets the condition specified by relop and condValueString or all rows if conditional is false
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the table to be updated
        fieldName - name of the field to be updated
        valueString - value to which the field is to be set
        isConditional - true iff the update is conditional
        condFieldName - name of the field being checked for a condition
        relop - relation operator - "=", "!=", "<", ">", "<=", or ">="
        condValueString - value against which the field is to be compared
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is no table with the given name or the table does not contain fields with the given names or there is a problem accessing the table's data files

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String tableName,
          boolean conditional,
          java.lang.String fieldName,
          java.lang.String relop,
          java.lang.String value)
            throws DatabaseException
        Deletes all rows of the given table in which the value of the given field meets the condition specified by relop and value or all rows if conditional is false
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the table from which rows are to be deleted
        conditional - true iff deletion is conditional
        fieldName - name of the field being checked for a condition
        relop - relation operator - "=", "!=", "<", ">", "<=", or ">="
        value - value against which the field is to be compared
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is no table named tableName, the table has no field named fieldName, value does not correctly describe a datum of the field's type, or there is a problem accessing a data file of the table
